title: Poke City
description: Poke City is a desktop website for a poke shop. It is not responsive. This project allowed me to familiarize myself with UX Design and the GSAP library.

title: Booki
description: Booki is a bed and breakfast reservation website in Marseille. This project allowed me to implement a responsive design suitable for all media.

title: Nina Carducci
description: Nina Carducci is a freelance photographer. Her website was poorly indexed and needed performance optimization, better SEO, and accessibility improvements. So, I used my skills to meet her needs.
